reviews.review: отличная игра всех времен и народов)
Fun. Too bad most things good here end up being heavy in file size and take up an eye gauging time , but its good. I like guns.

new steam account has about 80 hours clocked if memory serves.. 

my old one had about 500-600 hours, i'm 22 now and this was my teenage defining game, spent entire summer holidays playing it with my best friend. cannot reccommend enough. 

better than GO imo

++Pros
+Great game, many game modes!
+Good mechanics
+Good weapon stability
+Awesome PCW experience!
+Doesn't get booring

--Cons
-Lack of rank system (overall player ranks)
-Cheaters
-You might be banned from a server because the Administrator doesnt like you.
(Children which are admins)
-Skins on the servers might display as Error signs if you do not download the skin.
-Poor graphics
-Too small weapon pool

My experience is 4000 hours +
(only 500 on this account)

Overall i would recommend this game.
если хотите получить удовольствие и научится стрелять и быть крутым покупайте эту игру.
Jogabilidade perfeita! Se você procura por diversão counter strike é a franquia certa e isto sem duvidas fica evidente em source

Bestes Spiel!
Lohnt sich keine Frage ;).

Really fun game, great people, always plenty of different servers to play on, easy to add them onto your game. So many different type of servers. (GunGame, MiniGames, Deathrun, BunnyHop, JailBreak...) And HeLL has got a great radio, and awesome Dj's! So enjoy this great game :3

EDIT: HeLL perma bans you for complaining about admins insulting you at 3am funfun!
Great game i have been playing CS for a long time back in Romania...doing full nights allmost 3-4 times a week. Its very addictive and if you have friends playing is even more fun. A+++ from me
Není lepší hra. V Jednoduchosti je kouzlo :)

Beh cosa dire se non che questo gioco è incredibile 
Incredibilmente divertente appena entri nella sua logica ,con gli amici o da solo ogni singolo match è una soddisfazione
per non parlare delle innumerevoli modalita create dalla comunita che in compagnia ti fanno passare ore su ore senza mai farti stancare.
Insomma uno dei migliori fps sul mercato
10/10

Great game, highly customizable for users looking to make a server on the game, from things such as music, to images you can put on walls, all sorts, players also have great fun on Counter-Strike: Source too, I REALLY recommend this game.
Играю давно , игра по истине хорошая.

This game is not the most classic fps shooter, but valve did do a good job of implementing the specs and weapons from the earlier counter strike's into source, which is why this game is one of the best normal(not like COD) fps shooters. One thing I would suggest when you play this game is that it is always very fun to play with friends, and for me not with random people on servers. The effect this game has on GMod to is quite astonishing, SO BUY THIS GAME, THE 20 DOLLARS IS WORTH IT!!

this game is one of the best games i've ever played in my life but the new developer changed alot of things in the new game otherwise it's still great game to play online and you will almost not get bored from it.
esta bueno si te queres cagar de la risa (solo en servidores rusos :S) y eso, tambien los graficos estan buenos pero no te pongas a campear negro eWe e.e ¬¬
